item.title: Rubbish dumped on pavement yet again, 17th December
item.description:
One of the nearby residents every week is dumping their household waste right in the pavement by the bus stop, where all the Danson primary school kids was past for school. It’s been going on for over a year now. See photos of today’s mess attached. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Lane, Blackfen, Greater London
